*div1 type="summary"* *p*Robert Lewis to Austin, Cerralvo, Mexico, November 9, 1829. A dispute with Cameron concerning mines.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Cerralvo */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="11-09-1829">9th Nov. 1829*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Sir; we arrivd at this *location_mentioned*place */location_mentioned*a few days since and found *person_mentioned*Cameron */person_mentioned*here, and both *person_mentioned*Mr. Sharkey*/person_mentioned* and Myself being unwell nothing was said on business until we got better; *date_mentioned n="11-07-1829">day before yesterday*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr Sharkey*/person_mentioned* sent for him, and informed him he was ready to attend to business, and it was necessary first for us *person_mentioned*Cameron */person_mentioned*and myself to come to a proper understanding, as to our affaires —*/p*
*p*I then namd to him that I had formd a *person_mentioned*company */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Battinson*/location_mentioned*, to work *location_mentioned*Certain Mines */location_mentioned*by authority invested in me by an Instrument of writing, with his signature to it, I ask him if he claimd an interest in the *person_mentioned*company*/person_mentioned*, he said he did; I then ask him if that was his hand writing and if it containd his signature, he quivocated as much as he could at last he acknowledged his signature, but would not admit its vilidity; but stated it was void long since and said it never was intended to of been usd—but to give more confidence, in aiding me in forming the *person_mentioned*Company*/person_mentioned*. He said he would allow me an interest in those *location_mentioned*Mines */location_mentioned*the *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*had contracted to work alluding to the two *location_mentioned*mines */location_mentioned*in the Contract but as to allowing me an interest in other *location_mentioned*Mines */location_mentioned*he would not except some at *person_mentioned*Yguana */person_mentioned*he naimd these I might have an interest some naming them and more over he would not admit of any cantract he ever had mad with me, that he was not to be drove or compeld to do any thing by me—- of all the lying quivocating *person_mentioned*schondrals */person_mentioned*he beats all I ever saw—he said when he gave the Instrument he cold not Deny ownin *location_mentioned*Mines */location_mentioned*in his own name notwithstanding he bound himself to do so, this was fraud within its self, */p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-11-1829">day after tomorrow*/date_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr Sharkey*/person_mentioned* and myself intends seting out for *location_mentioned*Mounterey */location_mentioned*to precure all the legal information necessary both for myself and to satisfy himself as to the interest of the *person_mentioned*Company*/person_mentioned*.— The tools reach this place four days before we did, and if it was not for *person_mentioned*Cameron*/person_mentioned*s rascalaty we could commence our Mining operations in a week,—I should like for *person_mentioned*Mr. Williams*/person_mentioned* to hold himself in readiness, to come to my assistance in case much difficulty, I will advise you as soon as its practable—*person_mentioned*Cameron */person_mentioned*observed the reason he came on from *location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned*, and not meeting us, he heard some news that huried him off— he has secured the *location_mentioned*Mines*/location_mentioned*, I understand from him, as also from others,—If aney thing remains undone that would promote my interest in this business, dont fail to attend to it, he bids defiance as to my suing him,—If sufficient information could be procured to git the Govt, to call on him as respects his remarks respecting a seperat *location_mentioned*Republic*/location_mentioned*, it might be of service to me, as he depends so much on his influence both with the individuals here and the Govt.—any services rendered me will be thankfully reed*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Robt Lewis. */person_mentioned*[Rubric]*/p* *p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr Samuel M. Williams */person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Villa de Austin. Texas*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
